components.AccessTokenHelp.step1.content.defaultMessage: Open Dev Tools on Facebook Ads Manager page: right-click on the page and select Inspect. Or press Command ⌘ + Option ⌥ + C (Mac) or Control + Shift ⇧ + C (Windows, Linux).

components.AccessTokenHelp.step1.imgAltT.defaultMessage: Context menu in a browser with selected "Inspect" item

components.AccessTokenHelp.step2.content.defaultMessage: Jump into the Console panel and execute the following {snippet} code to displaying the Access Token.

components.AccessTokenHelp.title.defaultMessage: How to get the Access Token?
